title: ESL
description:
English as Second Language: A great english course offered by Hunte College in New York City, I've learning the following skills:
▪ Oral Skills: Where I'm learning to communicate and express my thoughts in English.
▪ Writing Skills: Here I'm learning to write academic essays, paragraphs and summarizing. 
▪ Reading Skills: Skills to fully understand articles, news and different academic texts. 
▪ Grammar Skills: The perfect class to study complex rules of the language.

title: Software Developtment
description: At Instituto Superior Tecnologico del Azuay I've learned to develop software from its basics up to complex web applicaitons, testing, web services, databases and team and customer communication.
